name: Vivint Solar, Inc.
description: Vivint Solar, Inc. is a leading residential solar provider in the United States, dedicated to making solar energy accessible and affordable for homeowners. Founded in 2011, the company has rapidly grown by offering innovative solar solutions, enabling customers to harness the power of the sun to reduce their energy bills and carbon footprint. Vivint Solar provides a comprehensive range of services, including solar panel installation, financing options, and ongoing maintenance, ensuring a seamless transition to solar energy. The company's commitment to customer satisfaction is evident in its personalized service and transparent pricing, making solar energy an attractive option for many households. Vivint Solar operates across multiple states, utilizing a combination of proprietary technology and a skilled workforce to deliver high-quality solar solutions tailored to the unique needs of each customer. As a part of the growing clean energy movement, Vivint Solar aims to contribute to a sustainable future by promoting renewable energy and reducing reliance on fossil fuels. The company’s mission is centered around empowering homeowners to take control of their energy production and consumption, paving the way for a greener planet.

faq.answer: David Bywater is the CEO of Vivint Solar, Inc.

faq.answer: Vivint Solar is headquartered in Lehi, Utah, USA.

faq.question: What financing options are available?
faq.answer: Vivint Solar provides solar leases and power purchase agreements (PPAs) to help customers finance their solar systems.
